bal_cap.description: balance cap for each token holder (eg. balance cap for each user = 1000, users can only hold up to 1000 tokens.

decimals.description: decimal places of the derivative token (for UI)

symbol.description: symbol / ticker of the derivative token

cap.description: cap is a hard cap on total supply that can be achieved by minting. Note that this refers to total_supply. If None, there is unlimited cap.
